snippet: The Pentagon has extended its equal opportunity policy to gay and lesbian troops, granting them an added layer of protection from discrimination and harassment.
lead_paragraph: The Pentagon has extended its equal opportunity policy to gay and lesbian troops, granting them an added layer of protection from discrimination and harassment.

headline.main: Pentagon Anti-Bias Policy Extended to Gays
headline.print_headline: Pentagon Anti-Bias Policy Is Extended to Gays
